validation.required: Meal name must be filled in.
validation.unique: Meal name already exists in current list.

actions.title: Actions
actions.both: Display both layout actions in mobile UI
actions.label: Label

mealCompletion.freeEntryComplete: free text entry of foods for the {object} is complete
mealCompletion.searchComplete: identification of foods in the {object} is complete
mealCompletion.portionSizeComplete: portion size estimation of foods in the {object} is complete
mealCompletion.complete: associated food prompts in the {object} are complete

foodCompletion.freeEntryComplete: free text entry for the {object} is complete
foodCompletion.portionSizeComplete: portion size estimation for the {object} is complete
foodCompletion.complete: associated food prompts for the {object} are complete

promptAnswer.required: Prompt answer is required (uncheck if this prompt should trigger if the answer is not known)

meals.title: Scheme meals overrides
meals.subtitle: Override scheme meal list. If left empty, scheme list is used. If any item added, whole list is used.

prompts.title: Scheme prompts overrides
prompts.subtitle: Override specific scheme prompt. Changes will get merged by Prompts ID.

prompts.title: Scheme prompts

preMeals.title: Pre-recall prompts
preMeals.subtitle: General prompts asked before the dietary recall, including personal prompts and the initial instructions.

postMeals.title: Post-recall prompts
postMeals.subtitle: General prompts asked after the dietary recall.

submission.title: Submission prompts
submission.subtitle: Final prompts asked before the submission.

preFoods.title: Pre-foods meal prompts
preFoods.subtitle: Prompts asked about meals before foods are entered, such as the meal time.

foods.title: Food prompts
foods.subtitle: Prompts asked about foods, including food database search and portion size estimation.

postFoods.title: Post-foods meal prompts
postFoods.subtitle: Prompts asked about meals after the portion size estimation is complete for all foods in the meal.

id.hint: Internal unique identifier, used e.g. in data-exports as header

name.hint: Internal descriptive name for better orientation

group.hint: Group ID to collate prompts together

custom.noPrompts: No custom prompts available for this section

standard.noPrompts: No standard prompts available for this section

portion-size.noPrompts: No portion size prompts available for this section

categoriesFirst._: Show categories first in the list

prompts.multiple: Allow multiple items to be selected
prompts.label: Options list label

linkedQuantity.title: Linked quantity settings
linkedQuantity.subtitle: Allows to trigger quantity prompt for linked parent food

validation.required: Prompt is required to be filled in

templates.title: Prompt Templates
templates.alreadyExists: Prompt with ID '{promptId}' already exists in scheme

addon-foods-prompt.title: Add-on foods
addon-foods-prompt.subtitle: Suggest foods typically consumed with this food
addon-foods-prompt.multiple: Allow multiple foods to be selected

associated-foods-prompt.title: Associated foods
associated-foods-prompt.subtitle: Suggest foods typically consumed together
associated-foods-prompt.multiple: Allow multiple foods to be selected

edit-meal-prompt.title: Food list
edit-meal-prompt.subtitle: List or edit foods in this meal as free text descriptions

external-source-prompt.title: External source
external-source-prompt.subtitle: Prompt for external source of food matching

food-search-prompt.title: Food database search
food-search-prompt.subtitle: Choose a food from the database that best matches the description
food-search-prompt.allowBrowsing: Allow respondents to search for foods by freely browsing food categories
food-search-prompt.dualLanguage: Display alternative food names in another language

meal-add-prompt.title: Add meal
meal-add-prompt.subtitle: Add a new meal to the meal list

meal-time-prompt.title: Meal time
meal-time-prompt.subtitle: Confirm the time of the meal or remove the meal

recall-date-prompt.title: Recall date
recall-date-prompt.subtitle: Ask to nominate recall date
recall-date-prompt.min: Number of days before today to allow
recall-date-prompt.max: Number of days after today to allow

redirect-prompt.title: Redirect
redirect-prompt.subtitle: Final page for user redirect to external site

url.title: URL Options
url.subtitle: Use '{identifier}' to indicate the place where user identifier should be to inserted.

identifier._: User identifier to embed into the URL
identifier.subtitle: Specify which identifier to embed into the redirect URL
identifier.hint: Custom value will be looked up in 'user custom fields'

target.subtitle: Choose where to open the URL

review-confirm-prompt.title: Review and Confirm
review-confirm-prompt.subtitle: Review and Confirm completion and progress of the recall

same-as-before-prompt.title: Same as before
same-as-before-prompt.subtitle: Ask if food was same as before

review.title: Final Review Options
review.subtitle: Choose the option you want for the final review page.
review.scroll: Scroll to bottom to pass review
review.checkbox: Tick meal check to pass review
review.onecheckbox: Tick one survey check to pass review

info-prompt.title: Information
info-prompt.subtitle: Show a message or instructions and ask for confirmation

no-more-information-prompt.title: No More Information
no-more-information-prompt.subtitle: Show a message that no more information needed for the current selection

date-picker-prompt.title: Date
date-picker-prompt.subtitle: Ask to choose a date
date-picker-prompt.min: Number of days before today to allow
date-picker-prompt.max: Number of days after today to allow

time-picker-prompt.title: Time
time-picker-prompt.subtitle: Ask to choose a time of day

checkbox-list-prompt.title: Multiple choice
checkbox-list-prompt.subtitle: Ask to choose any number of items from a list

radio-list-prompt.title: Single choice
radio-list-prompt.subtitle: Ask to choose one item from a list

select-prompt.title: Select
select-prompt.subtitle: Ask to choose value from select box

slider-prompt.title: Slider
slider-prompt.subtitle: Ask to choose value on slider

textarea-prompt.title: Free text
textarea-prompt.subtitle: Ask to enter a free text answer or description

yes-no-prompt.title: Yes / No choice
yes-no-prompt.subtitle: Ask to choose yes or no

as-served-prompt.title: As served portion size
as-served-prompt.subtitle: Use the "as served" method to estimate the portion size

cereal-prompt.title: Cereal
cereal-prompt.subtitle: Use the "cereal" method to estimate the portion size

drink-scale-prompt.title: Drink Scale
drink-scale-prompt.subtitle: Use the "drink scale" method to estimate the amount of liquid consumed

guide-image-prompt.title: Guide image
guide-image-prompt.subtitle: Use the "guide image" method to estimate the portion size

milk-in-a-hot-drink-prompt.title: Milk in a hot drink
milk-in-a-hot-drink-prompt.subtitle: Use the "milk in a hot drink" method to estimate the amount of milk

milk-on-cereal-prompt.title: Milk on cereal
milk-on-cereal-prompt.subtitle: Use the "milk on cereal" method to estimate the portion size

pizza-prompt.title: Pizza
pizza-prompt.subtitle: Use the "pizza" method to estimate the portion size

pizza-v2-prompt.title: Pizza V2
pizza-v2-prompt.subtitle: Use the "pizza v2" method to estimate the portion size

parent-food-portion-prompt.title: Portion of parent food
parent-food-portion-prompt.subtitle: Use the "portion of parent food" method to estimate the portion size

portion-size-option-prompt.title: Portion size estimation method
portion-size-option-prompt.subtitle: Choose which portion size method to use in case more than one is available for the food

recipe-builder-prompt.title: Build your own dish
recipe-builder-prompt.subtitle: Build your own dish from the ingredients

standard-portion-prompt.title: Standard portion
standard-portion-prompt.subtitle: Use the "standard portion" method to estimate the portion size
